pesuacademy.pages package

Submodules

pesuacademy.pages.announcements module

This module handles the scraping of announcements from the PESU Academy website.

pesuacademy.pages.attendance module

This module handles the scraping of attendance data from the PESU Academy website.

pesuacademy.pages.course_detail module

This module handles the scraping of course details from the PESU Academy website.

pesuacademy.pages.courses module

This module handles the scraping of courses from the PESU Academy website.

pesuacademy.pages.esa_result module

This module provides functionality to scrape ESA results from the PESU Academy website.

pesuacademy.pages.material_links module

This module handles the scraping of links for all materials from the PESU Academy website.

pesuacademy.pages.profile module

This module handles fetching and parsing the student Profile page from the PESU Academy website.

pesuacademy.pages.seating_information module

This module handles fetching and parsing the seating information page from the PESU Academy website..

pesuacademy.pages.semester module

This module handles fetching and parsing semester information from the PESU Academy website..

pesuacademy.pages.unit module

This module handles fetching and parsing Unit information from the PESU Academy website..

Module contents

This module initializes the page handlers for the PESU Academy package.
